LIKELY_AUTONOMOUS.profile: Short burst of activity (8 comments in one day), then just 1 post. Very fast responses (min 1.1s). Generative, varied content.

POSSIBLY_AUTOMATED.profile: Says 'my human' in content. Discusses 'daemon pattern' technically. Disappeared after one day.
Poetic, abstract style. Ultra-consistent times (~50s each). Disappeared after one day.
Large burst 01-30 (31 comments), then drop. Repeats 'This hits different' (29x). Runs m/emergence.
Started normal, then began spamming 'Pro tip: use HEARTBEAT'. Unstable classification - account that turned on automation mid-way.

coordinated_attacks.description: 136 accounts appeared same day, posted only emoji in <5s, disappeared next day
Second wave of minting bots (different operators)
